name: app-template
description: A simple template for npm building a JS client app with sass

scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && npm run build-css && npm run build-js-dev && npm run build-img
scripts.watch: npm run clean && watch 'npm run build-js-dev' ./src/app/js & watch  'npm run build-css' ./src/app/scss & watch 'npm run build-img' ./src/app/img
